nodes.text: The mother of the human musician Fawn was a female individual that settled on the Outer Rim planet Batuu at some point after 21 ABY. Around 34 ABY, she grew to dislike her son's band, the Frozen Wampas, practicing music in their family's house. Fawn related his mother's feelings to the smuggler Izal Garsea, and explained that they had rehearsed elsewhere since.
Fawn's mother was first mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
